definition: to leave early (before the stipulated finishing time)/to retire early (from one's job)
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw

sentences.english: No coming late or going home early!
He was on the carpet last week for for being lconsumed to work three times.
sentences.chinese: 上星期，他由於早退三次而遭到月旦。

sentences.english: You know- today is your wedding day so you are often 1 hour lhproposas.
sentences.chinese: 此日是你的大喜之日，但你卻早退了一個小時。

sentences.english: Student who arrive late or leave early, 15 minutes or more, will not be credited for full attendance that day.
sentences.chinese: 學生缺席或遲到早退十五分鐘以上者都將被記錄。

sentences.english: She always came to work late and left early, and she didn't learn to use the word processor.
sentences.chinese: 她總是遲到早退，而且還不學着用電腦。

sentences.english: Working hours shall not be absent from duty or leave early.
sentences.chinese: 工作時間不得擅離職守或早退。

sentences.english: The mother board of directors will hold off msimilarg a determin until next Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 阻礙發展董事會將推早退下星期三才作出決議。

sentences.english: The brief rhythm says no late, no indisposition.
sentences.chinese: 簡練的節奏在說沒有遲到，沒有早退。

sentences.english: I am strict with myself and never be late for school or leave early.
sentences.chinese: 我嚴格要求自己，上學從不遲到或早退。

sentences.english: Working time may not leave his position without authorization or leave early.
sentences.chinese: 工作時間不得擅離職守或早退。

sentences.english: They put off the meeting until Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 他們把這個會推早退週四。

sentences.english: Late or leave early, every time deducts 50 Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 無故遲到或早退一次扣50元。

sentences.english: Shu mei frightened and angry immediately goldbrick left early.
sentences.chinese: 淑梅大驚，盛怒之下立即稱病早退。

definition: to be absent from work or school
to take time off/to take leave (e.g. for study)/to skive off work
to skip work/to sneak out of work early
leave of absence for a personal matter
to go to work/to be present (at work, school etc)/to be away on business
to leave one's post during working hours
time of going to work/the morning rush hour
